resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104129</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104129</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201833</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">MDG Bingo! </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">MDG Bingo!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bingo-test de MDG !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bingo de MDG!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bingo di MDG!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">MDG Bingo!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Bingo de MDG!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This variation on Bingo allows students to apply research skills and build knowledge of the interconnected issues underlying Millennium Development Goals (MDGs). Using principles of peer education, students share their research with each other in a fun, interactive, and collaborative way. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Variante auf Bingo erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, 
Forschung Fähigkeiten anzuwenden und Wissen der verbundenen Ausgaben 
zugrundeliegenden Jahrtausend-Entwicklung Ziele (MDGs) aufzubauen. 
Mit Grundregeln der Gleichausbildung, teilen Kursteilnehmer ihre
Forschung mit einander in einem Spaß, interaktiv und in der 
gemeinschaftlichen Methode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette variation sur le bingo-test permet à des étudiants
d'appliquer des qualifications de recherches et d'établir la 
connaissance des buts fondamentaux interconnectés de développement 
de millénium d'issues (MDGs). En utilisant des principes 
d'éducation de pair, les étudiants partagent leur recherche avec 
l'un l'autre dans un amusement, interactif, et la voie de 
collaboration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta variação no bingo permite que os estudantes 
apliquem habilidades da pesquisa e construam o conhecimento dos 
objetivos subjacentes interconectados do desenvolvimento do millennium
das edições (MDGs). Usando princípios da instrução do par, 
os estudantes compartilham de sua pesquisa com se em um divertimento, 
interativo, e na maneira collaborative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa variazione sul bingo permette che gli allievi 
applichino le abilità di ricerca e sviluppino la conoscenza degli 
obiettivi di fondo collegati di sviluppo di millennio delle 
edizioni (MDGs). Usando i principii di formazione del pari, gli 
allievi ripartiscono la loro ricerca con a vicenda in un divertimento,
interattivo e nel modo di collaborazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η παραλλαγή σε Bingo επιτρέπει στους 
σπουδαστές για να εφαρμόσει τις ερευνητικές δεξιότητες και να 
χτίσει τη γνώση των διασυνδεμένων ζητημάτων που κρύβονται κάτω 
από τους στόχους ανάπτυξης χιλιετίας (MDGs). 
Χρησιμοποιώντας τις αρχές της όμοιας εκπαίδευσης, οι 
σπουδαστές μοιράζονται την έρευνά τους ο ένας με τον άλλον με 
έναν διαλογικού, και συνεργάσιμου τρόπο διασκέδασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta variación en bingo permite que los estudiantes 
apliquen habilidades de la investigación y que construyan el 
conocimiento de las metas subyacentes interconectadas del desarrollo 
del milenio de las ediciones (MDGs). Usando principios de la 
educación del par, los estudiantes comparten su investigación con 
uno a en una diversión, interactiva, y manera de colaboración.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201833</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104129</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mdg-bingo</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
